column1: #Text='If she was a man, she would be president-elect today.'
#Text=Clinton lost because of her past not because of her gender.
#Text=You can't have it both ways - the media constantly portrayed her opponent as a buffoon, yet if she couldn't defeat a buffoon it was because of who she is not because of her genitals.
#Text=There were better women who could have run but the Dems chose Clinton.
